name: The Chef's Shift
description:
THE RECIPE

As written by Chef Lorenzo himself

INGREDIENTS & UTENSILS

-1 teaspoon of chaotic, fast-paced gameplay
-1 package of easy-to-pickup hard-to-master typing mechanic
-1 cup of of fun time management bits
-3 food-grade programmers: Ali Jaya Meilio Lie, Roni Setiyawan,  Kuuki Kei
-3 food-grade artists: Muhamad Mentari, Mega Anjani Putri (Mega), Elvira Ayuniar

DIRECTION
  1. Cook some dish! Prepare your dish by typing words using keyboard accordingly (we've seen some chef tried using a steering wheel to accomplish that, but please don't do that)
  2. Serve dish to your paying customer by typing words above their head. Make sure you already stock up their preferred dish beforehand so you don't end up standing there awkwardly in silence. Serve them before they lose interest in consuming Italian cuisine
  3. When in doubt, press BACKSPACE to reset your typing (and allowing you to choose another word to type)
  4. Ocassionally, you’ll meet your official business competitor, Mr. Whisker, trying to fetch your recipe by sampling the whole thing. Unfortunately, diplomacy is a strange concept for him, so the best course of action is to let your trusty (and invisible) revolver to do the talking. Type the words above the rat to let the gun do the gun thing
  5. Again, when in doubt, press BACKSPACE to reset your typing
  6. Rinse and repeat until your shift ends
  7. Compare highscore among your peers to assert dominance
  8. Our current highscore is 240 ;)
